fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, Agriculture, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, Trade, Competition, Consumers, Customs, Business and Industry, Environment, Taxation, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Single market, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, External Relations, Food Safety, Climate Action, Borders and Security
eu_initiatives: Retail action plan, supply chain, labeling rules, product safety, payment systems, competition law
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
membership: Federation of Finnish Commerce, BSCI (Business Social Compliance Initiative), Independent Retail Europe, Finnish Chambers of Commerce
goals__remit: Kesko Corporation is a listed trading sector company. It manages retail store chains and efficiently produces services for retail store chains' purchasing, logistics, network development and data management. Kesko's operations include the food, home and speciality goods, building and home improvement, and car and machinery trades. Its divisions and chains act in close cooperation with retailer entrepreneurs and other partners. Kesko has about 2,000 stores engaged in chain operations in Finland, Sweden, Norway, Estonia, Latvia, Lithuania, Poland, Russia and Belarus.
